title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5110.2 - Construction contractor identification number
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5110.2 - Construction contractor identification number

State Regulations
(a) It shall be the responsibility of each
video lottery gaming agent to ensure that all construction contractors with
which it seeks to conduct business has first obtained from the commission a
construction contractor identification number by submitting an application for
such number on a form prescribed by the commission. (b) The commission shall maintain the name
and business address of each construction contractor receiving an
identification number pursuant to this Part. During normal business hours, a
licensed employee shall escort a construction contractor on the gaming
floor. (c) Notwithstanding any
other provision of these regulations, no video lottery gaming agent shall enter
into an agreement with any person or business entity who: (1)
has been denied a construction contractor
registration and identification number; (2)
has failed to comply with the appropriate
filing requirements for a construction contractor; (3)
has been temporarily prohibited from
doing business with any video lottery gaming agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5110.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
